name: Block Tower Stack-Up - Reach up high in the sky, play this endless blocks stacking game
name_original: Block Tower Stack-Up - Reach up high in the sky, play this endless blocks stacking game
description:
Addicting stacking game. Stack your way up reaching as high as possible. Just tap the screen to stack. Time your tap.

Get the game now!!
